body_html:
I have no doubt Gunhan gave good advice. Please note that API introductions typically require multiple inputs and it's oftentimes necessary to see the actual change and use cases before they can be considered.

Speaking only for myself, I would feel most comfortable if this API was introduced because it made something possible that was not possible to do before. I also want to understand why the code that needs this API can't be written in a different way where it's no longer required.

body:
I have no doubt Gunhan gave good advice. Please note that API introductions typically require multiple inputs and it's oftentimes necessary to see the actual change and use cases before they can be considered.

Speaking only for myself, I would feel most comfortable if this API was introduced because it made something possible that was not possible to do before. I also want to understand why the code that needs this API can't be written in a different way where it's no longer required.
